Actor builds - Introduction

The API endpoints in this section allow you to manage your Apify Actors builds.

 Get list of builds
/acts/{actorId}/builds
 Build Actor
/acts/{actorId}/builds
 Get default build
/acts/{actorId}/builds/default
 Get OpenAPI definition
/acts/{actorId}/builds/{buildId}/openapi.json
 Get build
/acts/{actorId}/builds/{buildId}
 Abort build
/acts/{actorId}/builds/{buildId}/abort
